thread.title: JLT Specialty USA Announces Appointment of Rob Hausler as Executive Vice President

author: cnbc.com
title: JLT Specialty USA Announces Appointment of Rob Hausler as Executive Vice President
text:
HOUSTON, May 11, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- JLT Specialty USA, a U.S. subsidiary of Jardine Lloyd Thompson Group plc. (LSE:JLT), the leading global specialist risk advisor and broker, is pleased to announce the appointment of Rob Hausler as Executive Vice President.
Joining JLT’s rapidly growing team, Hausler will wear many hats and play a pivotal role in managing accounts and transactions, mentoring colleagues and business development.
Based in Houston, Hausler comes to JLT from Marsh, where he served as US Energy & Power Practice Leader. Hausler is a recognized industry expert, and in particular, brings a wealth of knowledge in the midstream and downstream energy sectors. His technical industry experience and leadership skills are well known in the energy and power arenas and his reputation as one who asks nothing of anyone that he wouldn’t first do himself precedes him as he begins his new career at JLT.
“We are ecstatic that Rob is joining our team. I have known and worked with Rob for years. He stands for everything we do. He is a client first professional,” said Jim Pierce, Deputy Co-Chair, Global Specialty and Head of Energy, Power & Mining at JLT Specialty. “His joining us adds additional depth and bench strength to our US specialty operations, which will benefit our clients.”
“Rob’s reputation in the energy sector is second to none,” said Bill Helander, EVP, U.S. Head of Energy, Power, & Mining at JLT Specialty USA. “We are really pleased he is joining us and he will no doubt help us grow our specialty business. Rob is the consummate professional.”
JLT encourages any potential applicants interested in rapidly developing their careers and becoming part of its U.S. Specialty team to contact Karen Isaacs at 215-309-4601, karen.isaacs@jltholdings.com .
